texts.my_address: 20/6 Kha Van Can Street, Hiep Binh Chanh Ward, Thu Duc District, Ho Chi Minh City.
texts.my_about: I am a Flutter developer with expertise in UI/UX design for web and mobile applications. I constantly strive to improve my skills in building intuitive and accessible experiences, ensuring smooth and responsive applications through performance optimization. I using Getx, Bloc for state management in my Flutter projects. Additionally, I using Node.js for backend development, utilizing cloud services like AWS (S3, Cloudfront) and Cloudinary for managing storage and media. I'm actively improve caching data with Redis, learning RabbitMQ to further enhance my backend capabilities.
texts.my_frontend: Flutter (Android, Web): Building a Responsive Android/Website with Flutter. Using Getx, Bloc at State manager, multi theme/language app
texts.my_school_info: Engineer's Degree of Information Technology with GPA: 2.4/4.0.
texts.my_project_1_info: A collections Widget, Theme and useful UI package for design beautyful apps
texts.my_project_2_info: General all my knowledge about NodeJs, RestApi for Restfull api, have example for AWS (S3, Cloudfront), Cloudinary, RabbitMQ, And some usecase in real project
texts.my_vision:
Improve backend/frontend optimize.
Upgrage perfomence/security application.
Learn more and deep technology
Improve coding speed and clean code.
